text: Azanaba intumwa kuri bene Isiraheli, (ababwire) ati "Mu by’ukuri, njye mbazaniye igitangaza giturutse kwa Nyagasani wanyu; ndababumbira mu cyondo ikimeze nk’inyoni, ngihuhemo maze gihinduke inyoni ku bushobozi bwa Allah. Ndakiza uwavukanye ubumuga bwo kutabona, umubembe, mbishobojwe na nzureabapfuye Allah, ndetse mbabwire ibyo mwariye n’ibyo muhunitsemu ngo zanyu". Mu by’ukuri, muri ibyo harimo ikimenyetso kuri mwe,niba koko muri abemera
